name: misrender
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something has been misrendered, it is written or appears in the wrong form: Transliteration is occasionally inconsistent, and some names are misrendered. The emojis were misrendered as lozenges. The name of the city is mis-rendered in various forms in close proximity to one another. Related word
render (CAUSE)
More examplesFewer examplesTurkish spellings for the names are misrendered.The manuscript was signed "Strigio" (with one "g"), which was misrendered as "Strigeo".There is a risk that some pages will be misrendered.
